articles.title: Video: Hear the audio of the altercation between McCarthy and Burchett | CNN Politics
articles.description: Republican Rep. Tim Burchett accused Kevin McCarthy of elbowing him in the back while he was talking to a reporter after the House GOP conference meeting. Audio caught the moments after when Burchett confronted McCarthy.

articles.author: Jude Russo
articles.title: Politics Archives - The American Conservative
articles.description: Good economic numbers and horrible public confidence provide the starkest illustration yet of our national syndrome.

articles.author: OMRI NAHMIAS
articles.title: Congresswoman Nita Lowey: I am proud to stand with Israel
